colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @030A *, ,('DI NI BON PO DAG GI MTSUN LHA RNAMS KYI RTEN BZHENGS PA DANG, TSE THAR GTONG BA SOGS KYIS 'PHRAL DU RE ZHIG PHAN PA 'DRA BAR YOD KYANG, MTHU STOBS CAN GYI BON PO DNGOS GNAS PA DKON PA DANG, BON PO'I MING GTOGS PA MANG YOD KYANG LAN MO TZAM LA YID CHES DGA' BA'I PHYIR, @030B DKON MCHOG GI BKA' DANG BDEN PA'I STOBS KYIS MA GRUB CI YANG MED DO SNYAM NAS BDAG 'DI'I 'DON CHA TZAM BSGRIGS NAS BYAS PA LA PHAN PA MYONG BA MTHONG BA LA, PHYIS MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS LA RNAM DPYOD MCHOG TU YANGS PA'I MKHAN PO CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG GRAGS PAS 'DI BSHAMS TSUL DANG MDZAD BYANG SOGS GSAL BA ZHIG DGOS ZHES PA'I GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, LHA BA NAG PO'I BCOS THABS MI MTHUN KUN 'JOMS DANG, CHAG MDO SMAN RAMS PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS MDZAD PA'I LHA NGAG GIS BCOS THABS AU RGYAN SLOB DPON CHEN PO'I MDZAD PA SOGS DPE CHA MANG PO'I GZHIR BCAS TE, BTZUN GZUGS TZAM 'CHANG BA'I SBYIN PA BLO TSE DANG @031A *, ,BIKshU DHYA NA ZHES BYA BA'I TSIG DON RGYAS PAR SBYAR BA'O, ,BLA MA MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS THUGS KHREL GYI GNAS YIN PAS BZOD PAR GSOL LO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
